name: Bohris
description:
========= About the Game ========

It’s time to dig! Bohris is here and with it’s beats and glory, you will reach the bottom of everything!

========= How To Play ==========

A+D or arrow keys to turn, Space to start.

======== Music and Sound Effects ========

If you do not like the music you can turn them off by toggling the music checkbox

======== Feedback ========

If you have feedback or found a bug, please leave a comment here or tweet me at @dievo.

======== Versions =======

Windows Versions are available via itch.io. Sourcecode is available as Dropbox Download.

======== Software =========

First Time using Godot (really nice game engine!), Aseprite (Graphics), Labchirp (SFX), Cakewalk (Music), Illustrator (Additional Graphics)

======== Bugs =========

There should not be any major bugs left, but if you find one, please let me know.

======== The End =========

I had about 14 hours to create this game so don’t expect a super balanced game. Also, I had never worked with Godot before, but for that, it went quite smooth.
